tit.cmt: イタリック体をゴシック体に修正しました。

sen.j: 『群書類従』（ぐんしょるいじゅう）は国書の叢書である。
sen.e: "Gunsho ruiju" is a library of Japanese literature.
Gunsho ruiju is a library of Japanese literature.
"Gunsho Ruiju" is a library of Japanese literature.
sen.cmt: イタリック体をゴシック体に修正しました。ruiju を Ruiju に修正しました。Gunsho Ruiju にダブルコーテーションを追記しました。

sen.j: 編者塙保己一が古書の散逸を危惧し、41年をかけて収集・編纂したものである。
sen.e: An editor Hokiichi HANAWA took 41 years to collect and edit them, worrying about loss of old books.
An editor, Hokiichi HANAWA, took 41 years to collect and edit them, worrying about the loss of old books.
An editor, Hokiichi HANAWA, took 41 years to collect and edit them, worrying about the loss of old books.

sen.j: 文政2年（1819年）、塙保己一が編纂した。
幕府や諸大名・寺社など多くの機関や人が協力し、江戸時代初期までに刊行された史書や文学作品、計1273種を収めている。
sen.e: With the cooperation of a number of organizations and people including the shogunate, territorial lords, temples and shrines, it includes 1,273 kinds in total, which are history books and literature published by the early Edo Period.

With the cooperation of a number of organizations and people, including the shogunate, territorial lords, temples, and shrines, it includes 1,273 kinds in total, which are history books and literature published by the early Edo Period.

With the cooperation of a number of organizations and people, including the shogunate, territorial lords, temples, and shrines, it includes 1,273 kinds in total, which are history books and literature published by the early Edo Period.

sen.j: その後の歴史学・国文学等に多大な影響を与え、学術的な研究に貢献している。
sen.e: It had a significant impact on later historical science and Japanese literature, and contributed to academic researches.
It had a significant impact on later historical science and Japanese literature, and contributed to academic research.
It had a significant impact on later historical science and Japanese literature, and contributed to academic research.

sen.j: 正編1270種530巻666冊からなり、以下の25部に分類されている。
sen.e: The main part of the books consists of 1270 kinds, 530 volumes and 666 books, and is divided into 25 categories below.
The main part of the books consists of 1270 kinds, 530 volumes and 666 books, and is divided into the 25 categories below.
The main part of the books consists of 1270 kinds, 530 volumes and 666 books, and is divided into the 25 categories below.

sen.e: Kemari (a game played by aristocrats in the Heian period)

sen.j: 塙保己一は群書類従の版木を製作させる際、なるべく20字×20行の400字詰に統一させていた。
sen.e: Hokiichi HANAWA had the printing plate of Gunsho ruiju made with unified 400 characters, having 20 characters by 20 lines, as much as possible.
Hokiichi HANAWA had the printing plate of Gunsho ruiju made with unified 400 characters, arranged 20 characters by 20 lines, as much as possible.
Hokiichi HANAWA had the printing plate of Gunsho Ruiju made with unified 400 characters, arranged 20 characters by 20 lines, as much as possible.
sen.cmt: イタリック体をゴシック体に修正しました。ruiju を Ruiju に修正しました。

sen.j: これが現在の原稿用紙の一般様式の元となっている。
sen.e: This has become the original of the general form of the current manuscript paper.
This became the original of the general form of the current manuscript paper.
This became the original of the general form of the current manuscript paper.

sen.j: 『三大編纂物 群書類従・古事類苑・国書総目録の出版文化史』
sen.e: See "The Three Greatest Collections - Cultural History of Publishing Gunsho ruiju, Kojiruien (Dictionary of Historical Terms) and Kokusho somokuroku (General Catalogue of Japanese Writings)"
